component.name: Emoji Mart
component.summary: A modern popup emoji picker, based on the Emoji Mart web component.

description.p: Launch the emoji picker with your favorite keyboard shortcut, and select an emoji to paste in the clipboard, or directly in the focused window on X11.

ul.li: 🍾 Built as a popup: quick invocation through the system custom shortcuts, and disappears when not needed, does not stay as a standalone window, does not run in the background
🔎 Search text box automatically focused and ready to type when invoked
⌨️ Can use the keyboard to navigate and select emojis
⚔️ Cross-platform, can be installed natively on Linux, MacOS, or Windows
🧑‍🚀 Uses modern and flexible technologies (Tauri, TypeScript, and Svelte), making it easier to maintain and build upon in the future

✒️ On x11 the selected emoji is automatically pasted to your currently focused app, instead of being added to the clipboard! (it allows to uses emojis without losing what was copied before). This can be enabled also on Wayland, but require to open permissions of /dev/uinput
⚠️ Auto-paste can be enabled on Wayland, but it requires to open permissions of /dev/uinput, which is not recommended for security concerns. See the homepage for more details.
